name: single-spa-app
description: single-spa example that shows how to use a utility module to share some application state across other microfrontends

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy deploy/util-auth deploy/util-ui deploy/app-footer deploy/app-angular deploy/app-home deploy/app-login deploy/app-header
scripts.postbuild: cp packages/root/dist/* deploy && cp packages/app-home/dist/* deploy/app-home && cp packages/app-footer/dist/* deploy/app-footer && cp packages/app-angular/dist/* deploy/app-angular && cp packages/app-angular/dist/* deploy/app-angular && cp packages/util-ui/dist/* deploy/util-ui && cp packages/util-auth/dist/* deploy/util-auth && cp packages/app-home/dist/* deploy/app-home && cp packages/app-login/dist/* deploy/app-login && cp packages/app-header/dist/* deploy/app-header
